body:

This ICE seems to be fixed on

```
rustc 1.12.0-nightly (b30eff7ba 2016-08-05)
```

I have a hunch that this is due to MIR being turned on, though I'm not sure. Please let me know if this still ICEs for you, but closing for now :confetti_ball:
